label: lem-cubic-patch-coefficients
name: Explicit Coefficients of the Smooth Rescale Patch
relations_established: Coefficients A, B, C, D of cubic patch P(z) are uniquely determined
Determined by boundary conditions and parameter z_max > 1
natural_language_statement: The cubic polynomial patch P(z) on [z_max-1, z_max] has explicit coefficients A, B, C, D uniquely determined by boundary conditions and parameter z_max > 1.
